Still laughing so hard I am having a hard time completing this post...

Still laughing so hard I am having a hard time completing this post...

If that's for real, then one of 3 scenarios:

SQUAD is actually a NASA contractor using our feedback from playing the game to improve on their rocket design solution to be used by NASA

NASA rented some Kerbals for effect in a press release

Somebody here has too much time on their hands, and a lot of UI mods in their KSP.

If that's for real, then one of 3 scenarios:

SQUAD is actually a NASA contractor using our feedback from playing the game to improve on their rocket design solution to be used by NASA

NASA rented some Kerbals for effect in a press release

Somebody here has too much time on their hands, and a lot of UI mods in their KSP.

That...or someone pasted Kerman profiles into the NASA 3D spacecraft program. (Can't remember its name, can watch every NASA prboe, satellite, etc.)
Unpossible!! Jeb never fears and Bob is happy? What kind of sorcery is this?

Unpossible!! Jeb never fears and Bob is happy? What kind of sorcery is this?

Jeb gets scared when things go too well according to plans.
